TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IAuthDelegate

Docs.summary: Interface that is used to provide mip with the user token.

MemberSignature.Value: public string AcquireToken (Microsoft.InformationProtection.Identity identity, string authority, string resource);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string AcquireToken(class Microsoft.InformationProtection.Identity identity, string authority, string resource) cil managed
abstract member AcquireToken : Microsoft.InformationProtection.Identity * string * string -> string

Docs.param: The authority the token needs to be generated against.
The resource the token is set to.
Docs.summary: This method is called when an auth token is required for the policy engine with the given identity and the given challenge.
Docs.returns: The token needed for accessing the resource.
Docs.remarks: If the application failed to acquire a token, it should throw an exception in this function.
